insert into bvrfis_xjws.b_matchAnResult ( matchid, logid, wxbusiid, centerid, wqbusiid, percent, result, relstate, describe, remark, inuser, indate, edituser, editdate, matchtype, version )
SELECT #{item.matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.logid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wxbusiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.centerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wqbusiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.percent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.indate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.edituser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.editdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} FROM dual
